message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It offers unparalleled value and can significantly enhance your operations. Considering its exceptional quality and benefits, we believe it's worth $950000. Let's discuss how we can make this a win-win situation for both of us.
I appreciate the enthusiasm, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe that's a more reasonable price for the product, considering its value to me.

Thank you for your response, Bob. We understand your perspective and are committed to finding a fair solution. To better align with your expectations, we would like to propose a price of $900000 for our premium product. This price reflects the value we believe the product brings to you while remaining competitive. We hope this proposal will facilitate a successful transaction.
I appreciate the revised offer, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $875000. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the product's value to me.

We appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. In light of your offer, we would like to propose a price of $890000 for our product. This price aims to balance your budget constraints while still reflecting the significant value our product offers. We believe this could be a mutually beneficial arrangement.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $875000. I'm willing to meet you at $882500. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the product's value to me.

We're glad you've found a price point that works for you, Bob. In consideration of your latest offer, we would like to propose a price of $887500 for our product. This price aims to provide a fair compromise while still ensuring a reasonable profit margin for us. We hope this offer meets your expectations and facilitates a successful transaction.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $882500. I'm willing to meet you at $885000. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the product's value to me.

We're grateful for your persistence, Bob. In light of your offer, we would like to propose a price of $887000 for our product. This price reflects a reasonable compromise that considers both the value you receive and our business interests. We hope this offer will lead to a satisfactory conclusion for both parties.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $882500. I'm willing to meet you at $886250. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the product's value to me.
